item.title: Don't treat your notes like blogs
item.description: Don’t treat your notes like blogs You cannot write your notes as if they were blogs. This idea opposes to [[learn in public]] and [[teaching is the best way to learn]] But at the same time I think that we should separate things that are for us and things that we can explain to other person, as [[we talk to our selves different than we talk to other people]]

item.title: My obsidian note-taking system
item.description: My obsidian note-taking system Obsidian controls Search/Create notes (⌘ + p) Command Palette (⌘ +⇧ + P) GIT Slides Admonition Insert templates (⌘ +t ) Tags draft - ([[#Digital garden]] visibility) VIM-like motion Sidebar L(⌘ + ⇧ + B) - R (⌘ + ⇧ + X) Highlight (⌘ + h) Plugins Excalibrain [[Obsidian Excalidraw Plugin]] Drawing Linking Drawing Libraries Embed drawing [[Obsidian Outliner]] Configuration [[Obsidian Templater]] [[Obsidian Dataview]] [[Kindle]] Templater Admonition What and how I use Obsidian for?
